abstract: Warren Buffett talked with Vanity Fair about succession, Berkshire’s culture and the “10 most immortal words in the history of economics.”
snippet: Warren Buffett talked with Vanity Fair about succession, Berkshire’s culture and the “10 most immortal words in the history of economics.”
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett gave Vanity Fair an 11-hour tour of Omaha, talking about his succession plans, Berkshire culture, what he hates most about his job, and the “10 most immortal words in the history of economics.”

headline.main: Buffett on Berkshire, Succession and America
